name: Prince of Persia: Redemption
summary: Prince of Persia: Redemption was a proposed title in the Prince of Persia series by Ubisoft Montreal in 2010-2011, whose pitch was never picked up. It is rumored to have been a continuation to the Prince of Persia 2008 universe, which ends in a cliffhanger. It reached mainstream news when a YouTube video showing the game's concept surfaced from the depths of the internet in 2020, 8 years after it was uploaded.
